title: DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 17 Therapy Assistant Posts
description: The District Health Society Madurai (DHS Madurai) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 17 Medical Consultant, Therapy Assistant, Pharmacist, Multipurpose Worker, Tuberculosis Laboratory Supervisor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, BUMS, 12th, D. Pharm, Diploma, B.Sc Nursing, DMLT can apply for the DHS Madurai Recruitment 202...
